siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, This week we speculate about the Apple WWDC invite and what announcements might be coming at the June event. After that we find out that Stan uses Apple Health far more than any of us knew. From there we find out that Stan also has an overly complicated schedule on…

frontmatter.title: Stan Makes Full Use of Apple Health

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, This turned out to be a sort of catch up in the life of Jon and Stan episode. Stan is having some football woes which leads to a lament to kick off the episode. Stan didn’t add a lot to our list of talking points. So Jon added random things including an EcoBee…
